column4: does anyone know the consequences of Opening the Filesystem twice?
-> what do you mean boot the ubuntu in ubuntu?
-> then you can attempt to remount it rw
-> then you can attempt to remount the FS to make it rw
-> you refuse my request, im going to miss your responses
yes i can edit my /etc/network/interfaces but when i do sudo ifconfig eth0 down / up it doesnt pull anything from the iface eth0
-> try  sudo  ifdown eth0;  sudo ifup eth0
well like i said i had to do the sudo ifconfig 10.10.10.2 and then sudo route default gateway 10.10.10.1 to get online so let me disable all that and then try the ifdown and ifup...
-> did that work? sudo ifup eth0 ?
-> now take a note in regards to difference between ifconfig command and the script  ifup
-> so hopefully you learned to save a copy of your working xorg.conf  in case you do another update
